title.rendered: Children participate in various activities of Children’s Club

content.rendered: The Children’s Club of Mission Education centre MITWA met on the 6th of November 2016. A variety of activities were conducted like singing, acting, dancing, storytelling in the club to bring out the hidden talents of the children. Other activities like playing cricket, watching documentary movies, rope jumping, group dances etc are also conducted on regular basis in the Children’s Club. Activities such as these also boost the confidence of the children and helps in bringing out their thoughts regarding various matters giving them an environment of free thinking and expressing themselves.
